1: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when he had made an end</n> לְדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>of speaking</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> שָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>unto Saul</n> וְנֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>that the soul</n> יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <sup>3083 </sup> <n>of Jonathan</n> נִקְשְׁרָ֖ה <sup>7194 </sup> <n>was knit</n> בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>with the soul</n> דָּוִ֑ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> [וַיֶּאֱהָבֹו כ] (וַיֶּאֱהָבֵ֥הוּ <sup>157 </sup> <n>loved</n> ק) יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <sup>3083 </sup> <n>and Jonathan</n> כְּנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>him as his own soul</n>
2: וַיִּקָּחֵ֥הוּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> שָׁא֖וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>him that day</n> הַה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> נְתָנ֔וֹ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and would let</n> לָשׁ֖וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>him go no more home</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָבִֽיו׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>to his father's</n>
3: וַיִּכְרֹ֧ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>made</n> יְהוֹנָתָ֛ן <sup>3083 </sup> <n>Then Jonathan</n> וְדָוִ֖ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>and David</n> בְּרִ֑ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> בְּאַהֲבָת֥וֹ <sup>160 </sup> <n>because he loved</n> אֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> כְּנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>him as his own soul</n>
4: וַיִּתְפַּשֵּׁ֣ט <sup>6584 </sup> <n>stripped</n> יְהוֹנָתָ֗ן <sup>3083 </sup> <n>And Jonathan</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמְּעִיל֙ <sup>4598 </sup> <n>himself of the robe</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> עָלָ֔יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖הוּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>that [was] upon him and gave</n> לְדָוִ֑ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>it to David</n> וּמַדָּ֕יו <sup>4055 </sup> <n>and his garments</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>including</n> חַרְבּ֥וֹ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>even to his sword</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>including</n> קַשְׁתּ֖וֹ <sup>7198 </sup> <n>and to his bow</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>including</n> חֲגֹרֽוֹ׃ <sup>2290 </sup> <n>and his belt</n>
5: וַיֵּצֵ֨א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> דָוִ֜ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> בְּכֹל֩ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> יִשְׁלָחֶ֤נּוּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> שָׁאוּל֙ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>whithersoever Saul</n> יַשְׂכִּ֔יל <sup>7919 </sup> <n>him [and] behaved himself wisely</n> וַיְשִׂמֵ֣הוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>set</n> שָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>and Saul</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>582 </sup> <n>him over the men</n> הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> וַיִּיטַב֙ <sup>3190 </sup> <n>and he was accepted</n> בְּעֵינֵ֣י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of all the people</n> וְגַ֕ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and also</n> בְּעֵינֵ֖י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>and also in the sight</n> עַבְדֵ֥י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>servants</n> שָׁאֽוּל׃ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>of Saul's</n> פ
6: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happened</n> בְּבוֹאָ֗ם <sup>935 </sup> <n>And it came to pass as they came</n> בְּשׁ֤וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>was returned</n> דָּוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>when David</n> מֵהַכּ֣וֹת <sup>5221 </sup> <n>from the slaughter</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistine</n> וַתֵּצֶ֨אנָה <sup>3318 </sup> <n>came out</n> הַנָּשִׁ֜ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>that the women</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> עָרֵ֤י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of all cities</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> [לָשֹׁור כ] (לָשִׁ֣יר <sup>7891 </sup> <n>sing</n> ק) וְהַמְּחֹל֔וֹת <sup>4246 </sup> <n>and dancing</n> לִקְרַ֖את <sup>7122 </sup> <n>to meet</n> שָׁא֣וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Saul</n> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> בְּתֻפִּ֥ים <sup>8596 </sup> <n>with tabrets</n> בְּשִׂמְחָ֖ה <sup>8057 </sup> <n>with joy</n> וּבְשָׁלִשִֽׁים׃ <sup>7991 </sup> <n>and with instruments</n>
7: וַֽתַּעֲנֶ֛ינָה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>answered</n> הַנָּשִׁ֥ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>And the women</n> הַֽמְשַׂחֲק֖וֹת <sup>7832 </sup> <n>[one another] as they played</n> וַתֹּאמַ֑רְןָ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> הִכָּ֤ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>hath slain</n> שָׁאוּל֙ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Saul</n> [בַּאֱלְפֹו כ] (בַּאֲלָפָ֔יו <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> ק) וְדָוִ֖ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>and David</n> בְּרִבְבֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>7233 </sup> <n>his ten thousands</n>
8: וַיִּ֨חַר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>wroth</n> לְשָׁא֜וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> מְאֹ֗ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>was very</n> וַיֵּ֤רַע <sup>7489 </sup> <n>afflict</n> בְּעֵינָיו֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>affliction</n> הַדָּבָ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>and the saying</n> הַזֶּ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>him and he said</n> נָתְנ֤וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>They have ascribed</n> לְדָוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>unto David</n> רְבָב֔וֹת <sup>7233 </sup> <n>ten thousands</n> וְלִ֥י נָתְנ֖וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and to me they have ascribed</n> הָאֲלָפִ֑ים <sup>505 </sup> <n>[but] thousands</n> וְע֥וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>more</n> ל֖וֹ אַ֥ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>also</n> הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃ <sup>4410 </sup> <n>kingsom</n>
9: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שָׁא֖וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> [עָוֹן כ] (עֹויֵ֣ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>fault</n> ק) אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דָּוִ֑ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> מֵהַיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>from that day</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וָהָֽלְאָה׃ <sup>1973 </sup> <n>and forward</n> ס
10: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <sup>4283 </sup> <n>And it came to pass on the morrow</n> וַתִּצְלַ֣ח <sup>6743 </sup> <n>came</n> רוּחַ֩ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>spirit</n> אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <sup>430 </sup> <n>from God</n> רָעָ֤ה ׀ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>that the evil</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>upon</n> שָׁאוּל֙ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>upon Saul</n> וַיִּתְנַבֵּ֣א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>and he prophesied</n> בְתוֹךְ־ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> הַבַּ֔יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> וְדָוִ֛ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>and David</n> מְנַגֵּ֥ן <sup>5059 </sup> <n>played</n> בְּיָד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>with his hand</n> כְּי֣וֹם ׀ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>as at other times</n> בְּי֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>usual</n> וְהַחֲנִ֖ית <sup>2595 </sup> <n>and [there was] a javelin</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> שָׁאֽוּל׃ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>in Saul's</n>
11: וַיָּ֤טֶל <sup>2904 </sup> <n>cast</n> שָׁאוּל֙ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֲנִ֔ית <sup>2595 </sup> <n>the javelin</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>for he said</n> אַכֶּ֥ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>I will smite</n> בְדָוִ֖ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> וּבַקִּ֑יר <sup>7023 </sup> <n>even to the wall</n> וַיִּסֹּ֥ב <sup>5437 </sup> <n>avoided out</n> דָּוִ֛ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[with it] And David</n> מִפָּנָ֖יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>of his presence</n> פַּעֲמָֽיִם׃ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>twice</n>
12: וַיִּרָ֥א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>was afraid</n> שָׁא֖וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>of</n> דָוִ֑ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>because the LORD</n> עִמּ֔וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וּמֵעִ֥ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>from</n> שָׁא֖וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>from Saul</n> סָֽר׃ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>was with him and was departed</n>
13: וַיְסִרֵ֤הוּ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>removed</n> שָׁאוּל֙ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Therefore Saul</n> מֵֽעִמּ֔וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>his presence</n> וַיְשִׂמֵ֥הוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>him from him and made</n> ל֖וֹ שַׂר־ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>him his captain</n> אָ֑לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>over a thousand</n> וַיֵּצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and he went out</n> וַיָּבֹ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came in</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הָעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> פ
14: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> דָוִ֛ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> דָּרְכָ֖ו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in all his ways</n> מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <sup>7919 </sup> <n>behaved himself wisely</n> וַֽיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> עִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
15: וַיַּ֣רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> שָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Wherefore when Saul</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מַשְׂכִּ֣יל <sup>7919 </sup> <n>wisely</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>himself very</n> וַיָּ֖גָר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>he was afraid</n> מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>of</n>
16: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>But all Israel</n> וִיהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>and Judah</n> אֹהֵ֖ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>loved</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דָּוִ֑ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and he</n> יוֹצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>because he went out</n> וָבָ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came in</n> לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> פ
17: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> שָׁא֜וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> דָּוִ֗ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>to David</n> הִנֵּה֩ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Here</n> בִתִּ֨י <sup>1323 </sup> <n>daughter</n> הַגְּדוֹלָ֤ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>Behold my elder</n> מֵרַב֙ <sup>4764 </sup> <n>Merab</n> אֹתָהּ֙ <sup>853 </sup> אֶתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>her will I give</n> לְךָ֣ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>thee to wife</n> אַ֚ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>only</n> הֱיֵה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לִּ֣י לְבֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>man</n> חַ֔יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>valiant</n> וְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>for me and fight</n> מִלְחֲמ֣וֹת <sup>4421 </sup> <n>battles</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD'S</n> וְשָׁא֣וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>For Saul</n> אָמַ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תְּהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יָדִי֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>Let not mine hand</n> בּ֔וֹ וּתְהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ב֖וֹ יַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>be upon him but let the hand</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> ס
18: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> דָּוִ֜ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> שָׁא֗וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>unto Saul</n> מִ֤י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> אָֽנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> וּמִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>and what</n> חַיַּ֔י <sup>2416 </sup> <n>Who [am] I? and what [is] my life</n> מִשְׁפַּ֥חַת <sup>4940 </sup> <n>family</n> אָבִ֖י <sup>1 </sup> <n>[or] my father's</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> חָתָ֖ן <sup>2860 </sup> <n>that I should be son in law</n> לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>should be the king's</n>
